text: Thomas Pickard may refer to: * Thomas Pickard (footballer) (1911–1967), English footballer * Thomas J. Pickard (born 1950), former FBI director * Thomas Pickard (politician) (1819–1895), college teacher and politician in New Brunswick, Canada * Tom Pickard (born 1946), poet and filmmaker * K. Thomas Pickard (born 1963), American healthcare entrepreneur
title: Thomas Pickard
